alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 11:31AM PST until February 15 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM MONDAY TO 4 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, some higher amounts possible in the higher peaks. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph could result in blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Northern Elko County. * WHEN...From 7 PM Monday to 4 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions alongside reduced visibility with blowing and drifting snow. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
